sentences.en: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.cn: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

sentences.en: Editorially, they never really became a unique distinct product.
sentences.cn: 就立场和观点来说，它们从未真正做到树立起自己独具一格的视角。

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: He has never exhibited the self-confidence, bordering on arrogance, of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他从未表现出他前任的那种近乎傲慢的自信。

sentences.en: He waited until all the luggage was cleared, but Paula's never appeared.
sentences.cn: 他一直等到所有的行李都拿走了，但始终没看见葆拉的。

sentences.en: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.cn: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.en: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。

sentences.en: I never go on the bus into the town.
sentences.cn: 我从不坐公共汽车去城里。

sentences.en: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.cn: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.en: I'm very much a loner — I never go out.
sentences.cn: 我这人非常孤僻，从不出门。

sentences.en: I've never seen him get cross or lose his temper.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过他生气或者发火。

sentences.en: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.en: Never again (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.cn: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

sentences.en: Parallel lines will never meet no matter how far extended.
sentences.cn: 无论延伸多长，平行线永不相交。

sentences.en: She had stopped nagging him about never being home.
sentences.cn: 她不再不停地指责他总不在家了。

sentences.en: She never participated in obtaining or copying any classified documents for anyone.
sentences.cn: 她从未参与过为任何人获取或复制机密文件之事。

sentences.en: She'd never received the merest hint of any communication from him.
sentences.cn: 她从未得到他准备沟通的一丁点儿暗示。

sentences.en: the gaunt figures strode ever onwards; never a one turned his head from his goal.
sentences.cn: 憔悴的人们向前迈着步子，没有一个人扭头。

sentences.en: the gaunt figures strode ever onwards; never a one turned his head from his goal.
sentences.cn: 憔悴的人们向前迈着步子，没有一个人扭头。

sentences.en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentences.cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentences.en: The queue for places at the school has never been longer.
sentences.cn: 排队申请上这所学校的人数达到历史最高峰。

sentences.en: Well I never—that's not like you!.
sentences.cn: 我真没想到那不像你！。

sentences.en: You could never eliminate risk, but preparation and training could attenuate it.
sentences.cn: 风险不可能完全消除，但可以通过防范和培训来降低。

phrases.tran_cn: 亡羊补牢；迟做比不做好
拒绝再玩，不再；再也不会
勿失良机，机不可失；把握现在

phrases.phrase: well I never! (或 I never did!)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)我真没想到（或见到、听到）过

trans.tran_en: not at any time, or not once
